description: Sets up a AWS SQS queue

sqs_subscribers.description: List of SQS ARNs to push from this topic.

items.description: The ARN of the SQS queue to subscribe to.

delay_seconds.description: Seconds to delay passing the message forward

message_retention_seconds.description: The number of seconds SQS retains a message.

receive_wait_time_seconds.description: The seconds for which a ReceiveMessage call will wait for a message to arrive (long polling) before returning. Must be an int from 0-20.
